Please read the following terms and conditions (“Terms”) carefully. You (“you”, “User”) are advised that the Terms govern the contractual agreement between a user who accesses and/or uses the mobile application(s) made available from time to time by Shuga Pte. Ltd. (“Company”, “us”, “we”), including iOS, Android, and Windows Mobile versions (“Application”), any of the Company’s services (“Services”), www.shuga.io and any other website associated with the Company (“Website” and together with the Services and the Application, known as the “Shuga Platform”) and the Company in relation to the access, browsing, interactions, rights and obligations in connection with the use of the Shuga Platform.

These Terms, including all terms, conditions and policies incorporated herein by reference, together with any notices published on the Website or Application shall constitute the entire agreement between you and the Company concerning the Shuga Platform. If you do not agree with any of these Terms, or if you have any objections to our Privacy Policy you must not, and are not authorised to, use the Shuga Platform.

These Terms may be periodically modified or revised from time to time and such modification or revision will be effective upon notification to you of the same whether through the Application, Website or other means of communications. Do ensure that you review the revised Terms as your subsequent use and/or access of the Shuga Platform and/or the services shall be deemed to be your agreement to be conclusively bound by any such modification or revision. As our Services may be changed or modified over time, we may change, modify or discontinue all or any part of the Services at any time and without notice.

You will have to create an account and password with us in order to access and use the Shuga Platform (“Account”). When creating an account, we may ask you for certain information, such as your name, email address, telephone number, etc. and we may do so by requesting for permission to retrieve such information from your Facebook account or by any other means as stated by the Company from time to time. This will allow us to customise your experience with the Shuga Platform, and allow you to participate in the redemption of points under the Shuga Platform (“Shuga”). You will not be permitted to participate in the services conducted through the Shuga Platform without creating an Account.

As a condition of your access to and/or use of the Shuga Platform, you warrant that:

We are not liable for any loss or damage from your failure to comply with these requirements and you agree that the Company shall not be responsible to you nor shall you be entitled to make any claim, demand or request for compensation from the Company in respect of any loss or damage suffered by you as a result of any unauthorised access to and/or use of your Account and password.

Shuga

Shuga are similar to reward points, which are earned by means such as walking into physical stores, scanning certain items while physically in a store, making purchases of certain items and other methods as indicated within the Shuga Platform. The Company reserves the right to change, add or remove any award types, and the methods by which Users can earn and redeem Shuga or other awards, for any reason and without notice to you, in its sole discretion and at any time. All Shuga, under all programs are rewarded on a “first come, first served” basis.

In order to be awarded Shuga, you must use the Shuga Platform in accordance with the Terms. You should further note that there will likely be limits on how many times you can be eligible for Shuga in various time periods (a day, a week, a month, etc.) for each action, and for each program. Eligibility requirements for all programs may change without prior warning. Please do check the Application, or relevant pages within the Shuga Platform for the most up-to-date information in relation to the redemption of Shuga.

You agree to use the Application and Shuga Platform only for the actions required, and in compliance with these Terms. We will not be liable for a failure to award Shuga under any circumstance, for any reason, including due to errors in your mobile device or mobile network, failing to complete the actions and/or failure to follow the stated directions. We cannot guarantee that eligibility dates will not change without prior warning, and we therefore disclaim all responsibility for any failure to award Shuga. All Shuga awarded shall be credited to your Shuga Wallet and can be viewed at the History section of the Application.

There are various ways for you to earn Shuga through the Shuga Platform as set out below:

  1. Shuga for Walk-ins

    Shuga for walking-in can only be earned if you are physically present at eligible participating walk-in locations that are open for business and active at the time you have the Application open, your device has network reception while you are accessing the relevant pages in the Application, and there are available Shuga for distribution at the time (“Walk-in Shuga Award”). It should be noted that there may be certain restrictions on how often you can walk into a store to earn Shuga and you should always check the Application for the most up-to-date information. Please note that we are not liable for a failure in an Walk-in Shuga Award if the maximum Shuga allocated to the relevant participating store has been awarded to other Account holders. You should also note that the number of Shuga that will be awarded to you for walking into the same participating store may change from time to time. You also agree by participating in the Walk-in Shuga Award that the Company has no obligation to notify and inform you when there are no more Shuga to be earned as the maximum Shuga allocated to the relevant participating store has been fully awarded.

  2. Shuga for Scans

    Shuga for scans can be earned by using the scanning function on the Application (or similar functions in the Shuga Platform as specified by the Company from time to time) to scan the bar codes of participating products with your device’s camera while you are physically present at eligible participating stores, and there are available Shuga for distribution at the time (“Scan Shuga Awards”). The scanning function on the Application will only be available to you when you and your device is detected to be physically within the eligible participating stores. The scanning function on the Application will not be available to you if you are not physically in the eligible participating stores. The identity of participating products and their locations will be communicated to you from time to time through the Shuga Platform. It should be noted that each participating product will have a limit on the number of times the relevant product may be scanned in a specified time period which may be a day, a week or a month (as the case may be), and there will also be limits on the time interval between each scan. Please scan the participating products one at a time in order for the scanning function to be able to register the participating product and process the same. Some time may be required between each scan. Further, each participating product has a limited number of scans available for all Users of the Application and the Shuga Platform. If the scan limit is reached, you will no longer be able to earn Shuga for scanning that participating product. You should also note that the number of Shuga that will be awarded to you for scanning the same participating product may change from time to time.

    You agree that by participating in the Scan Shuga Awards program, the Shuga Platform may access your device’s camera, and that the Company will review the scans made by your device. In addition, you also agree to use the Shuga Platform, the Scan Shuga Award and the Purchase Shuga Award (as defined below) solely for the purpose of submitting scans to the Company, and to fully follow and comply with the Terms. In particular, you agree that you will only scan participating products at the locations listed in the Shuga Platform, unless you are otherwise directed by the Shuga Platform. Further, the Company does not guarantee that the advertised products will always be available for scanning at the published locations (e.g. a participating product may be out of stock in the said participating location, etc.), or that bar codes will always be accurate. Accordingly, please note that the Company disclaims any and all responsibility for any failed scanning experiences, errors, or mistakes that may occur during a scanning attempt. Additionally, we are not liable for a failure to award Shuga, including where such a failure occurs due to the inaccuracy of the information we may receive from participating product manufacturers and stores, or because there are no more Shuga to be earned as the maximum Shuga allocated to the participating product has been fully awarded. By participating in the Scan Shuga Awards, you agree that the Company is under no obligation to notify and inform you when there are no more Shuga to be earned as the maximum Shuga allocated to the relevant participating product has been fully awarded.

  3. Shuga for Purchases

    In order to earn Shuga for purchases, you will be required to send a copy of the receipt of purchase of the participating product to the Company through the scanning function, and there are available Shuga for distribution at the time (“Purchase Shuga Award”). You agree that by participating in the Purchase Shuga Awards, the Shuga Platform may access your device’s camera, and that the Company will review the scans made by your device. In addition, you also agree to use the Shuga Platform, the Scan Shuga Award and the Purchase Shuga Award program solely for the purpose of submitting scans to the Company, and to fully follow and comply with the Terms. You should also note that the number of Shuga that will be awarded to you for purchasing a participating product may change from time to time.

    We will only award you Shuga for qualifying purchases that are not returned. Such qualifying purchases are purchases of the participating product made from stores included in the Purchase Shuga Awards, such purchases are not held in default or deemed fraudulent, and fully comply with the Terms. Further information in relation to the participating products and the Purchase Shuga Awards will be listed in the Shuga Platform for more information.

    Purchase Shuga Awards may not be awarded or redeemed until a certain time period (for example, for returns associated with that relevant merchant participating in the Shuga Platform (“Partner”)) has passed. Typically, this time period is between 3 and 45 days, but it could be longer, as indicated in the History section of the Shuga Platform. During this time, the Shuga will be indicated as pending in the History section and will be transferred to the Shuga Wallet after the relevant time period has passed. If you make a return, the transaction is invalidated, disputed, or does not settle for any reason prior to the Shuga, then some or all pending Shuga will be deducted from your Account, as determined and at the sole and absolute discretion of the Company. If you make a return for cash or, store credit, we will take away some or all of your pending Shuga accordingly.

Candie

In addition to Shuga, you may also obtain candie (“Candie”) by tapping on them when they appear on the map within the Shuga Platform. Candie will also be awarded when you scan receipts of merchants who are not Partners (“Non-Partners”). In order to be eligible to obtain Candie for scanning receipts of merchants who are Non-Partners, the text, numbers and logo on the receipt must be clear and legible, show the date of the receipt, name of Non-Partner, address of the Non-Partner and total amount spent, have a receipt number and be computer generated.

Bonus Shuga

Bonus Shuga are awarded through the Shuga Refer a Friend program as described below (“Bonus Shuga”). Such Bonus Shuga will be accumulated in a separate Bonus Shuga Wallet and cannot be used by the User. However, the Bonus Shuga in the Bonus Shuga Wallet will automatically be converted to Shuga on a 1:1 basis and be transferred to the Shuga Wallet once more than 2000 Bonus Shuga are accumulated.

All Shuga credited to your Shuga Wallet will have a validity period of six months and will expire six months from the date it was credited to the Shuga Wallet. However, whenever fresh Shuga is credited to your Shuga Wallet, the expiry date of all the Shuga left in the Shuga Wallet which have not been redeemed or otherwise shall be extended for another six month, i.e. that all Shuga in your Shuga Wallet shall expire on the same date as the latest Shuga credited to your Shuga Wallet.

There is no expiry period for Bonus Shuga and Candie.

Shuga, Bonus Shuga and Candie are to be Awarded in Whole Numbers

Shuga, Bonus Shuga or Candie shall only be awarded in whole numbers. For the avoidance of doubt, the number of Shuga, Bonus Shuga or Candie to be awarded to Users will be rounded down to the nearest whole number and fractional entitlements to Shuga, Bonus Shuga or Candie shall be disregarded without compensation to the affected Users.

Refer a Friend

The Shuga Refer a Friend program is open to all Users. If an existing User (the “Referrer”) shares their unique link with a friend or relative who is not an existing User (subject to the eligibility criteria set out above) who subsequently downloads the Application through the unique link provided by the Referrer and sets up an Account (the “Referee”) via a device that is different from the one which the Referrer provided the unique link from (“Different Device”), the Referrer will be entitled to Bonus Shuga. If you choose to send such unique links, you represent to the Company that the recipients have consented to receive such messages from you, and that those recipients do not consider such messages unwanted or unsolicited, and that you made the active choice to send these links. We are not responsible or liable for sending any such links; these are expressly sent by you should you choose to make such referrals. Please note though that messaging fees may apply depending on the mobile phone plan you have with your mobile phone carrier.

If the foregoing eligibility criteria is met, the Referrer shall be entitled to Bonus Shuga: (i) when the Referree completes signing up for an Account (“Signing Up”); (ii) for all walk-ins successfully completed by the Referee in the first 30 days of Signing Up; (iii) for all scans successfully completed by the Referee in the first 30 days of Signing Up; and (iv) for all purchases successfully completed by the Referee in the first 30 days of Signing Up. The number of Bonus Shuga to be awarded to the Referrer for each of the aforementioned milestones may be different for each milestone, shall be determined in the sole and absolute discretion of the Company, and may be subject to change at any time.

There is no limit to the number of Referee’s that a Referrer may refer, and the Company is not obligated to inform the Referrer if their referrals are successful. Do note though that the Company retains the sole and absolute discretion to make amendments to the terms and conditions of the Shuga Refer a Friend program without prior notice to all Users, including for example to limit the number of Referees that a Referrer may refer.

The Company reserves the sole and absolute right to withdraw, amend and/or alter the terms and conditions of or end this Shuga Refer a Friend program at any time, without giving prior notice or compensation in cash or in kind.

  1. Redeeming Shuga and Candie for Rewards

    You may redeem Shuga and Candie for various rewards (“Rewards”) listed in the rewards section of the Application while such Rewards last and/or during the time periods specified. You can select any item still available for which you have accumulated sufficient Shuga and/or Candie that are ready for redemption. To redeem, click the selected item and follow instructions provided to claim the Reward. Shuga and Candie cannot be exchanged for cash, are not your property, cannot be sold, transferred, or assigned, and may only be redeemed for Rewards offered within the Shuga Platform. Shuga and Candie and other awards may be revoked at any time by the Company for any reason and without prior notice. All redemptions of Shuga and Candie for Rewards are final and cannot be exchanged.

    Some Rewards may be self-collected in eligible participating stores. In order to self-collect the Reward, a unique code and/or confirmation email for redemption may be provided to you directly via email, to your device or though the Shuga Platform. Emails will be sent to the email address you provide. This unique code and/or email will need to be presented to a store sales associate in order to redeem your Reward. Once this unique code/email is sent to you, the redemption process is handled by the store the card is to be used at, and we are not responsible or liable for the Reward value or the redemption process.

    Other Rewards may require a mailing address to ship the Rewards. You are responsible for maintaining the accuracy of your contact information in your Account. We may modify the list of Rewards periodically, and reserve the right to modify the Shuga values of the Rewards, and its applicable redemption at any time, for any reason. We are not the supplier of any Reward, and are not liable or responsible for its fulfillment or proper condition or value. Please contact the supplier of the Reward directly with any claims you may have.

  2. Shuga Wheel

    You may also use your Candie to spin the Shuga Wheel in the Application, provided you have accumulated the minimum number of Candie required for one chance to spin the Shuga Wheel (a “Spin”). The number of Candie required for a Spin and the type of rewards to be granted pursuant to a Spin will be set out in the Application.

    The Company reserves the sole and absolute right to disqualify Users from participating in the Shuga Wheel feature (whether due to a breach of these Terms or due to a participant having engaged in conduct that the Company considers inappropriate or unacceptable).The Company further reserves the sole and absolute right to withdraw, amend and/or alter the terms and conditions of or end this Shuga Wheel feature at any time, including the number of Candie required for a Spin, without giving prior notice or compensation in cash or in kind.

    Please note that Apple is not a sponsor of, or responsible for conducting, the Shuga Wheel.

  3. General Information regarding redemption of Shuga and Candie

    Shuga and Candie may be used as soon as they are reflected in your Account balance or may be accrued over time for later use prior to forfeiture or termination of the Shuga Platform. For the avoidance of doubt, there is no expiry period for Shuga, Bonus Shuga and Candie. Some Rewards may require additional time before they can be fulfilled. Refunds, exchanges and other issues regarding the redeemed item are governed by the Reward supplier’s terms and conditions applicable to the item, including any warranty, and are not our responsibility. Restrictions may apply to certain Rewards and the terms specific to the Rewards are disclosed through the Shuga Platform. Partners participating in the Shuga Platform are subject to change at any time. You are responsible for the payment of any applicable taxes that may result from Rewards received as part of the Shuga Platform. Rewards pictured within the Shuga Platform may not necessarily reflect exact colors or models of actual Rewards due to model variations and/or manufacturer’s updates.

    Merchandise rewards that are not collected by you or are not eligible for self-collection will be shipped within 14 business days from the date of the Reward redemption. Merchandise can only be shipped to locations in Singapore. Some merchandise Rewards require a street address for shipment. We reserve the right to substitute merchandise of equal or greater value in place of unavailable merchandise, or to refund Shuga that were redeemed for unavailable merchandise. All Rewards are provided “AS IS” without warranty of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose or non-infringement.

    To redeem Shuga and Candie for Rewards, you agree to comply with all applicable laws and to abide by these Terms. We expressly reserve the right to retroactively reverse any rewards or benefits granted to you for any prohibited conduct or violation of the Terms; you agree to provide your full cooperation and prompt repayment under such circumstances.

    If you believe that Shuga, Candie or other awards were not properly accrued to your Account, please notify us by using the Contact Us form on the Shuga Platform within 30 days of when you think the error occurred. Please allow 30 days for any claims to be researched and corrected as needed. Our determination will be final, and made in our sole and absolute discretion. Unfortunately, we cannot guarantee Shuga and Candie you believe should have been accrued can be credited to you later, if we are unable to determine the precise location you were in, or the action you took on the Application or at a store, at the time when you believe the Shuga and Candie should have been credited. Among other reasons, technical problems with a walk-in detection system may result in your action not being detected or verified accurately by the Shuga Platform. While we try to prevent that from happening, neither we nor our affiliates or business partners can be held liable for your inability to accrue Shuga, Candie or other awards in such event.

Any termination request will be handled within 30 days of receipt of such a request by the Company.

We may immediately terminate your Account or suspend your access to the Shuga Platform, and remove any Shuga, Candie, disqualify you from self-collecting any Rewards which you have redeemed or terminate shipping of any Rewards which you have redeemed and/or material (including any User Content provided by you) from the Website, Application or our servers, in the event that you breach the Terms, any information furnished by you is false or misleading or for other improper conduct, at our sole and absolute discretion and without prior notice to you. We will not be liable to you or any other person for termination of your Account or suspension of your access to the Services. Upon any termination or suspension, any information (including User Content) you submitted to the Shuga Platform may no longer be accessed by you. Furthermore, we will have no obligation to maintain any information stored in our database related to your Account or to forward any information to you or any other person.

You agree that any Message that we send to you electronically will satisfy personal data protection requirements.

Some Messages you may receive are via your telephone. For example, you may receive push notifications, local client notifications, text messages, picture messages, alerts, emails or other types of messages directly sent to you outside or inside the Application. For calls or text messages to the cellular phone number you provide, by agreeing to these Terms and by providing consent when asked, you authorise the Company to send texts or calls to your phone using an autodialer or a prerecorded voice.

In general, you have control over the settings for types of Messages and can opt in or out of these via the Shuga Platform or through the phone’s operating system (with the possible exception of infrequent, important service announcements and administrative messages).
